description: Bergs Timber AB engages in the production and trade of sawn and processed timber products. The company is headquartered in Vimmerby, Kalmar and currently employs 850 full-time employees.  Its forest products offering comprises Spruce Wood Products, such as joists, roof truss timbers, spars, laths, panels, tongued and slats, and Pine Wood Products, including furniture, pine fifths, planed duckboards, decking, blockhouses, joists and others. The production is carried out at several sawmill facilities, located in Morlunda, Orrefors and Emmaboda, Sweden, as well as in the timber preservation company Bitus, located in Nybro, Sweden. More than 70% of timber products are exported, primarily to the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, Denmark, the Middle East and North Africa.
name: Bergs Timber AB (publ)
